flawed_nl_solution:
The profit Ronald wants is $3000 / 3 = $<<3000/3=1000.0>>1000.0
The profit per phone sold will be $1000.0 / 200 phones = $<<1000.0/200=5.0>>5.0/phone
The cost of each phone is $3000 / 200 phones = $<<3000/200=15.0>>15.0/phone
The selling price including the profit will be $15.0/phone + $5.0/phone = $<<15.0+5.0=22.0>>22.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20.0, not 22.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
